forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers and wind overnight following a period of rain early. Low 12C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers and windy conditions developing overnight. Low 53F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 57F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
